sentences.en: From the angle of the relationship between justice and social order, retributive justice means suppressing and sacrificing the demand of protecting social order.
sentences.cn: 着眼于正义与社会秩序的关系，报应正义意味着对保护社会秩序的需要的抑制与牺牲；

sentences.en: He holds retributive punishment, while he is not against the punishment which had other aims.
sentences.cn: 他主张报应刑, 但不反对刑罚另有目的.

sentences.en: His conception of the criminal law turned on the idea of retributive justice.
sentences.cn: 在刑法观上,他不同意关于惩罚的正义性观点.

sentences.en: Retributive justice demands an eye for an eye.
sentences.cn: 报复型正义要求以眼还眼,以牙还牙.

sentences.en: The essence of religion is life transmigration, retributive justice and undying of soul.
sentences.cn: 宗教的精髓,就是生命轮回 、 因果报应、灵魂不死.

sentences.en: The onus is now on the Libyan people to show restraint and respect for the rule of law in dealing with regime officials and soldiers, and to refrain from vigilantism and retributive justice.
sentences.cn: 利比亚人民现在所能做的就是克制和尊重政府官员和士兵维持法纪，避免种种自卫报复行为。
